exterior: Help me, Lance... Please help me...
I am imprisoned in the palace dungeon.
The chairman of the Banker's Guild has foreclosed on my kingdom.
I fear for the safety of my subjects!
If Lance can't help him... Maybe I can.
We have the same name after all!
It sounds like the chairman has had the prince #{font:bold}throne#{font:default} in jail.
That pun may be your #{wave:3,9,0.1}crowning#{reset} achievement.
It must be really un-#{wave:3,9,0.1}peasant#{reset} for him...
